scripts.config:generate: tsx scripts/validate-config.ts dev && tsx scripts/convert-yaml-to-json.ts dev
scripts.build:dev: tsx scripts/validate-config.ts dev && tsx scripts/convert-yaml-to-json.ts dev
scripts.build:qa: tsx scripts/validate-config.ts qa && tsx scripts/convert-yaml-to-json.ts qa
scripts.build:prod: tsx scripts/validate-config.ts prod && tsx scripts/convert-yaml-to-json.ts prod
